name: Showa Summer Festival Story
storyline:
A nostalgic little summer festival held in a rural town in the Showa era.
It's a slightly neglected game that makes the festival lively and makes the venue a little lonely.

The sound of Higurashi in the town of Tanna japonensis, the Ayashii night shop, the fireworks looking up from the shrine ... We will deliver to you the summer of those days when you can't go home anymore.

Collect letters from the characters from time to time and read through the story.
Like collecting puzzle pieces, a girl's precious memories of one summer are spelled out.

You who mourn that you have become an adult.
You've been lonely lately, which was good when you were a kid.
You who will never come back and will never forget those shining days.
Let's start the journey to collect pieces of memories together.
We will provide you with a relaxing time to relax.
summary: As you progress through the game, old-fashioned "summer memory goods" will be registered in the picture book. Nostalgic! Showa Summer Festival Story is full of nostalgic memories, from those items that make you feel uncomfortable, to items that are a little painful.
